lessons.title: Arrays
lessons.question: Create an array with five fruits and add another one to the list.
lessons.answer:
let fruits = ['apple', 'banana', 'kiwi', 'orange', 'grape'];
fruits.push('pear');

lessons.title: Array Iteration
lessons.question: Print each element of an array using forEach.
lessons.answer:
let nums = [1, 2, 3];
nums.forEach(num => console.log(num));

lessons.title: Array Methods
lessons.question: Filter an array to keep only numbers greater than 10.
lessons.answer:
let numbers = [5, 12, 8, 20];
let large = numbers.filter(x => x > 10);
